import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react'; import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import 'react-rangeslider/lib/index.css'; import Slider from 'react-rangeslider' import './Shop.css' function ShopContent(props){ const products=props.products; const productCateList=props.productCateList; const [currentTab,setCurrentTab]=useState(1); const [gridTab,setGridTab]=useState(1); const [price,setPrice]=useState(0); const setting={ min:0, max:5000000, step:100000, value:price, tooltip:false, } const handleOnChange=(value)=>{ setPrice(value) } return(

{setCurrentTab(4)}} className={currentTab === 4 ? "shopcontent-tab-item active" : "shopcontent-tab-item"} > Sales Products
) } export default withRouter(ShopContent);
